Uses of Interface
org.epics.graphene.NumberColorMap

  • Packages that use NumberColorMap 
    Package Description
    org.epics.graphene  

    • Uses of NumberColorMap in org.epics.graphene

      Fields in org.epics.graphene declared as NumberColorMap 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.BONE
      BONE ranges from black to white passing from blue.
      static NumberColorMap IntensityGraph2DRenderer.DEFAULT_COLOR_MAP
      Default color map: JET.
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.GRAY
      GRAY ranges from black to white.
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.HOT
      HOT ranges from black to white passing from red and yellow.
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.HSV
      HSV goes through the color wheel: red, yellow, green, cyan, blue, magenta and back to red.
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.JET
      JET ranges from blue to red, going through cyan and yellow.
      Methods in org.epics.graphene that return NumberColorMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NumberColorMap IntensityGraph2DRenderer.getColorMap()
      Return the color scheme used for the value.
      NumberColorMap IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate.getColorMap() 
      NumberColorMap LineGraph2DRendererUpdate.getValueColorScheme() 
      Methods in org.epics.graphene that return types with arguments of type NumberColorMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Map<String,NumberColorMap> NumberColorMaps.getRegisteredColorSchemes()
      A set of registered color maps available to all applications.
      Methods in org.epics.graphene with parameters of type NumberColorMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate.colorMap(NumberColorMap colorMap)
      Sets this object's colorMap to the given ColorScheme.
      LineGraph2DRendererUpdate LineGraph2DRendererUpdate.valueColorScheme(NumberColorMap scheme)
